title: I wasted $1567 on Amazon MYSTERY TECH!
description: Get $80 off the KQI2 scooter!  Code: NIUAUSTIN valid April 16th   April 24th Mystery Tech gets a little wild as usual  Nix Color Sensor on Amazon:  Xbox Series X Aqua Shift controller on Amazon:  Mountain Everest 60 keyboard:  Good luck trying to find the Hisense A7 E Ink phone lol Fisher-Price Chatter Bluetooth phone on Amazon:  Sony LinkBuds headphones on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe to Ken's channel @Denki!  More shenanigans on @thisis:   My new F1 show @TheBackmarkers!  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
